tag_list: pollution-control-equipment, ventilation-equipment, air-pollution-control-equipment, industrial-ventilation-equipment, air-ventilation-system, ventilation-control-system, industrial-pollution-control-equipment
overview:
Airfilt Technologies Pvt Limited, Delhi

Incepted in the year 1996 by the name of Venticon Engineers. In the year 2000 the company was changed to M/s Airfilt Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

We are well equipped with all latest and advance machinery to cater to all sorts of industrial and commercial requirements. We are one one of the most trusted name in the field of ventilation equipment, pollution control equipment, air pollution control equipment. Our team comprises of dedicated engineers & experts. A separate team of workers, who undertake the site work and commissioning of the equipment. Apart from this, we have a dedicated team of designers, draughtsmen, technicians, erectors-fabricators etc. Some of our draughtsmen/ designers have been devoted to this industry for nearly three decades and are capable of finding out solutions for any typical problem.

Owing to state of art technology and involvement of well versed professionals have enabled us to offer variety of products which are made using high quality raw materials. We deal in variety of industrial ventilation equipment and pollution control equipment which are result of hard efforts. Few products, we provide are pulse jet filter unit, centrifugal blowers and paint booth etc. We have earned healthy reputation which is due to our high grade products.

Pulse Jet Filter Unit Centrifugal Blowers Axial Flow Fans Cyclone Separators

Mobile No : +(91)-9810022367
